class gameMessages.Message(text, color=Color(255, 255, 255))[source]¶

Defines an arbitrary message by text and colour

Parameters

  • color (tcod.color) – Color to display the message in

class gameMessages.MessageLog(x, width, height)[source]¶

Message log object displayed at the bottom of the screen.

Parameters

  • x (int) – Starting x-coordinate of messages. (We don’t need y because it’s necessarily set at the bottom of the screen.

  • width (int) – Width of message box

  • height (int) – Height of message box

menus.inventory_menu(console, header, inventory, inventory_width, screen_width, screen_height)[source]¶

Shows a menu which has the items stored in your inventory as options. For further information please look at the documentation for menu

menus.menu(console, header, options, width, screen_width, screen_height)[source]¶

Sets up an interactive menu

Menu displays options for interactive behaviour and pauses the game while it’s being accessed.

Parameters

  • console (tcod.Console) – Console window to draw to

  • header (str) – Header text for the menu

  • options (list) – List with available options to choose from

  • width (int) – Width of menu screen

  • screen_width (int) – Width of the entire game-screen (window)

  • screen_height (int) – Height of the entire game-screen (window)
